ml_tags: Ant, your gentleness, kindness, dignity, strength, positivity, courage and calmness was your true essence. May your spirit now soar our beautiful angel. Anthony Duncan Wallace In Loving Memory Of 19. 6. 1969 ~ 31. 8. 2021 Our Beloved Partner. Father. Step-Father. Son. and Friend Whatever we were to eachother, that we are still. All is well, I've just slipped into the next room. One brief moment and all will be as it was before. Until we meet again, remember im only next door.
